add-swc-deps.description: Adds @swc/core and @swc-node as a dev dep if you are using them

add-swc-deps-again.description: Adds @swc/core and @swc-node as a dev dep if you are using them (repeated due to bad version on earlier migration)

update-15-0-0.description: Migrates executor schema files to v2

update-configs-jest-29.description: Update nx plugin jest configs to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)

update-tests-jest-29.description: Update nx plugin jest test files to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
